Fields in playn.core declared as TextFormat.Effect
 TextFormat.Effect TextFormat.effect
          The effect to apply to the text when rendering, or NONE.

          Indicates that no text effect should be used.

Methods in playn.core with parameters of type TextFormat.Effect
